Text.Page:
We hired a troop of harlequins for the festival, but that blew up in our faces!

The jesters are mad and violent. They're allied with the lunatic witches and repulsing our efforts. Scour the third floor and kill the {@LinkCreature:22#16#mad vampiric jesters}.

Don't grieve overmuch for them. After the blood of so many children is spilled, what does the blood of fools matter?

You've done well for us. The jesters are surprisingly formidable.

No time to dawdle. There's more work to do.
